00096 DdNode *
00097 Cudd_SolveEqn(
00098   DdManager *  bdd,
00099   DdNode * F /* the left-hand side of the equation */,
00100   DdNode * Y /* the cube of the y variables */,
00101   DdNode ** G /* the array of solutions (return parameter) */,
00102   int ** yIndex /* index of y variables */,
00103   int  n /* numbers of unknowns */)
00104 {
00105     DdNode *res;
00106     int *temp;
00107 
00108     *yIndex = temp = ALLOC(int, n);
00109     if (temp == NULL) {
00110         bdd->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00111         (void) fprintf(stdout,"Cudd_SolveEqn: Out of memory for yIndex\n");
00112         return(NULL);
00113     }
00114 
00115     do {
00116         bdd->reordered = 0;
00117         res = cuddSolveEqnRecur(bdd, F, Y, G, n, temp, 0);
00118     } while (bdd->reordered == 1);
00119 
00120     return(res);
00121 
00122 } /* end of Cudd_SolveEqn */

00138 DdNode *
00139 Cudd_VerifySol(
00140   DdManager *  bdd,
00141   DdNode * F /* the left-hand side of the equation */,
00142   DdNode ** G /* the array of solutions */,
00143   int * yIndex /* index of y variables */,
00144   int  n /* numbers of unknowns */)
00145 {
00146     DdNode *res;
00147 
00148     do {
00149         bdd->reordered = 0;
00150         res = cuddVerifySol(bdd, F, G, yIndex, n);
00151     } while (bdd->reordered == 1);
00152 
00153     FREE(yIndex);
00154 
00155     return(res);
00156 
00157 } /* end of Cudd_VerifySol */

00179 DdNode *
00180 cuddSolveEqnRecur(
00181   DdManager * bdd,
00182   DdNode * F /* the left-hand side of the equation */,
00183   DdNode * Y /* the cube of remaining y variables */,
00184   DdNode ** G /* the array of solutions */,
00185   int  n /* number of unknowns */,
00186   int * yIndex /* array holding the y variable indices */,
00187   int  i /* level of recursion */)
00188 {
00189     DdNode *Fn, *Fm1, *Fv, *Fvbar, *T, *w, *nextY, *one;
00190 #ifdef __osf__
00191 #pragma pointer_size save
00192 #pragma pointer_size short
00193 #endif
00194     DdNode **variables;
00195 #ifdef __osf__
00196 #pragma pointer_size restore
00197 #endif
00198 
00199     int j;
00200 
00201     variables = bdd->vars;
00202     one = DD_ONE(bdd);
00203 
00204     /* Base condition. */
00205     if (Y == one) {
00206         return F;
00207     }
00208 
00209     /* Cofactor of Y. */
00210     yIndex[i] = Y->index;
00211     nextY = Cudd_T(Y);
00212 
00213     /* Universal abstraction of F with respect to the top variable index. */
00214     Fm1 = cuddBddExistAbstractRecur(bdd, Cudd_Not(F), variables[yIndex[i]]);
00215     if (Fm1) {
00216         Fm1 = Cudd_Not(Fm1);
00217         cuddRef(Fm1);
00218     } else {
00219         return(NULL);
00220     }
00221 
00222     Fn = cuddSolveEqnRecur(bdd, Fm1, nextY, G, n, yIndex, i+1);
00223     if (Fn) {
00224         cuddRef(Fn);
00225     } else {
00226         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fm1);
00227         return(NULL);
00228     }
00229 
00230     Fv = cuddCofactorRecur(bdd, F, variables[yIndex[i]]);
00231     if (Fv) {
00232         cuddRef(Fv);
00233     } else {
00234         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fm1);
00235         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fn);
00236         return(NULL);
00237     }
00238 
00239     Fvbar = cuddCofactorRecur(bdd, F, Cudd_Not(variables[yIndex[i]]));
00240     if (Fvbar) {
00241         cuddRef(Fvbar);
00242     } else {
00243         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fm1);
00244         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fn);
00245         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fv);
00246         return(NULL);
00247     }
00248 
00249     /* Build i-th component of the solution. */
00250     w = cuddBddIteRecur(bdd, variables[yIndex[i]], Cudd_Not(Fv), Fvbar);
00251     if (w) {
00252         cuddRef(w);
00253     } else {
00254         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fm1);
00255         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fn);
00256         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fv);
00257         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fvbar);
00258         return(NULL);
00259     }
00260 
00261     T = cuddBddRestrictRecur(bdd, w, Cudd_Not(Fm1));
00262     if(T) {
00263         cuddRef(T);
00264     } else {
00265         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fm1);
00266         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fn);
00267         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fv);
00268         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fvbar);
00269         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, w);
00270         return(NULL);
00271     }
00272 
00273     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd,Fm1);
00274     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd,w);
00275     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd,Fv);
00276     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd,Fvbar);
00277 
00278     /* Substitute components of solution already found into solution. */
00279     for (j = n-1; j > i; j--) {
00280         w = cuddBddComposeRecur(bdd,T, G[j], variables[yIndex[j]]);
00281         if(w) {
00282             cuddRef(w);
00283         } else {
00284             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, Fn);
00285             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd, T);
00286             return(NULL);
00287         }
00288         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd,T);
00289         T = w;
00290     }
00291     G[i] = T;
00292 
00293     Cudd_Deref(Fn);
00294 
00295     return(Fn);
00296 
00297 } /* end of cuddSolveEqnRecur */

00299 
00311 DdNode *
00312 cuddVerifySol(
00313   DdManager * bdd,
00314   DdNode * F /* the left-hand side of the equation */,
00315   DdNode ** G /* the array of solutions */,
00316   int * yIndex /* array holding the y variable indices */,
00317   int  n /* number of unknowns */)
00318 {
00319     DdNode *w, *R;
00320 
00321     int j;
00322 
00323     R = F;
00324     cuddRef(R);
00325     for(j = n - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
00326          w = Cudd_bddCompose(bdd, R, G[j], yIndex[j]);
00327         if (w) {
00328             cuddRef(w);
00329         } else {
00330             return(NULL); 
00331         }
00332         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(bdd,R);
00333         R = w;
00334     }
00335 
00336     cuddDeref(R);
00337 
00338     return(R);
00339 
00340 } /* end of cuddVerifySol */
